name: Avidus Interactive
rolesAndResponsibilities: Designing, documenting, and executing manual and automated test cases for multiple projects.
Collaborating closely with developers, product managers, and UI/UX teams to ensure product quality across web applications.
Developing test plans, identifying test scenarios, and ensuring traceability of test cases to requirements.
Conducting cross-browser and cross-device testing to ensure consistent behavior and responsiveness.
Reporting and tracking bugs using tools like Jira, and ensuring timely resolution and regression testing.
Writing end-to-end test scripts using Selenium and Cypress for UI, API, and performance testing.
Leading smoke, sanity, and regression testing cycles prior to deployment.
Communicating quality metrics to the team and continuously improving test coverage and efficiency.
